dcterms:creator: M. Andriluka
L. Pishchulin
P. Gehler
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: The MPII dataset is a benchmark for 2D human pose estimation, providing a large number of annotated images with various human poses, allowing for the evaluation of pose estimation algorithms.
dcterms:title: MPII

dcterms:creator: S. Johnson
M. Everingham
dcterms:description: The LSP dataset consists of images with clustered poses and provides ground truth annotations for human key points, facilitating the development and evaluation of pose estimation methods.
dcterms:title: LSP
